org.mmbase.security.implementation.cloudcontext

Interface UserProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicUserProvider

    public interface UserProvider
    The implemention of 'users' is pluggable, and should be returned by CloudContextAuthentication.getUserProvider(). Implementation defines what is a user, and how some of the esential properties of them are acquired.
    Version:
    $Id$ MMBase-1.9.1
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen

      • getUser

        MMObjectNode getUser(String user,
                     String pw,
                     boolean encoded)
        Returns the node associated with a certain username/password combination, or null
        Parameters:
        encoded - Whether or not the user is requested usering the username/encodedpassword login 'type' see Authenticate.login(java.lang.String, java.util.Map<java.lang.String, ?>, java.lang.Object[]).

      • isOwnNode

        boolean isOwnNode(User user,
                  MMObjectNode node)
        Returns whether the given node is an 'own' node. It should return true if the node is representing the mmbaseusers object which represents the current user. Extensions could e.g. also implement returning true for the associated people node.
